text.name: longdescription
text.text: The CDTV (from Commodore Dynamic Total Vision, later treated as a backronym for Compact Disc Television) is a home multimedia entertainment & video game console – convertible into a full-fledged PC. CPU Motorola 680x0 ≈@7+MHz, 1MB RAM, AmigaOS 1.3, 4096 colors. Media: CD-ROM. Release date Mar '91.
